mention.text: a Pashtun , the main Afghan tribe
a Tajik , as is his mother
Russia doesn t supply its missiles to Iran or Syria
200,000 Americans with the most advanced weaponry
the next day they change their mind
a former hotel in the city suburbs housing a multitude of shops and firms owned by Afghans
Those who do business in Russia
those who ask them to stay
a country with a US troop presence
elections in a country with a US troop presence
some who think that since Americans brought television and the internet , they should stay
our leader for a long time
a Mujahideen , Herat-born and had been its governor for a long time
Young Pashtuns aren t very optimistic .
these people who really value their independence
The behind-the-scenes war which they sense more clearly than the foreign observers do
Sayyaf - a Pashtun and a traitor
he , who shakes hands with the ruler
His Tajik friend who comes from Kabul
Mouhakkik , who is not so pro-Iranian
